data.text:
David Lee, MD, MSCI

MD: University of California, San Francisco

"Our monthly social events are always a big hit, and they are sponsored by the department. They really care!"

Hometown: San Francisco, CA

Personal Statement: I grew up in the San Francisco Bay Area, attended Williams College in western Massachusetts, then bounced back to my hometown for medical school at UCSF. I am now excited to experience something new at WashU. Beyond its standout faculty and residents, I chose WashU for its complete clinical training and collaborative research environment. I also had St. Louis ribs during my visit out here and now understand why people care so much about regional differences in barbecue.

Outside of the hospital, I enjoy time with friends, the Golden State Warriors, Japanese food, and non-Japanese food.

Education

Undergraduate: Williams College, BA in Chemistry and Political Economy, 2014

Medical School: University of California, San Francisco School of Medicine, 2019

MSCI: Washington University in St. Louis, 2022

Honors and Awards

Paparella Research Award for Basic and Clinical Science – 1st Place, Washington University in St. Louis School of Medicine, St. Louis, MO, 2023

University of California, San Francisco (UCSF) Graduate with Distinction, 2019

UCSF RAPtr Summer Research Award Winner, 2015
